Class CategoryDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhjoanneum.android.sqlite.db.CocktailDBDAO

  • public class CategoryDAO
extends CocktailDBDAO
    Class to interact with the database. Here you find all the queries for the category table of the data base
    Author:
    Manuela Mayer, Kahmann Sebastian
